cause.description:
The Lighted Candle Society (LCS) was created to awaken our fellow citizens to the ultimate danger to our way of life if the blight of pornography is allowed to continue to infest our culture.
1. Civil Litigation against the producers and distributors of pornography.
2. Scientific Research into the addictive nature of pornography.
3. heT publication of information that reveals the sources and the effects of pornography.
cause.mission: stem the tide and scourge of pornography in society.
